CmdLine: apt-get update     && apt-get install -y wget unixodbc-dev build-essential autoconf m4 libncurses5-dev     && wget "https://github.com/erlang/otp/archive/OTP-$OTP_VERSION.tar.gz" --quiet --output-document=otp-src.tar.gz     && mkdir -p /usr/src/otp-src     && tar -xzf otp-src.tar.gz -C /usr/src/otp-src --strip-components=1     && rm otp-src.tar.gz     && cd /usr/src/otp-src     && ./otp_build autoconf     && ./configure     && make -j$(nproc)     && make install     && rm -rf /usr/src/otp-src /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
